divs: sighting detailsfrom my back garden i saw a slow moving silvery object in the sky, a reasonable distance away. from the speed, i thought i'd had time to get some binoculars before it went behind cloud. by the time i got back it was gone. i can definitely say that it was not a plane\helicopter\bird. it may have been a balloon of some sort but i cannot be sure, which is why i was going for my binoculars.
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Newcastle Upon Tyne
There were no other sightings in Newcastle Upon Tyne on or around August 1st 2008
